thread.title: BRIEF-Chipotle Names Chris Brandt Chief Marketing Officer

title: BRIEF-Chipotle Names Chris Brandt Chief Marketing Officer
text: March 20, 2018 / 4:04 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Chipotle Names Chris Brandt Chief Marketing Officer Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc: * CHIPOTLE NAMES CHRIS BRANDT CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER * CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL INC - HIRED CHRIS BRANDT AS CHIEF MARKETING OFFICER, EFFECTIVE APRIL 2 * CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL - ‍MOST RECENTLY, BRANDT WAS AT BLOOMIN’ BRANDS, WHERE HE SERVED AS EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT​ * CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL INC - ‍PRIOR TO BRANDT’S TIME AT BLOOMIN’ BRANDS, HE SERVED AS CHIEF BRAND & MARKETING OFFICER AT YUM BRANDS’ TACO BELL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
